InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/04/2023
Preserving data on the J drive is relatively expensive, you can consider using the large volume or archive server (L or K drive). You can find more information about the different storage solutions here: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
You can also use KU Leuven RDR for data sharing, for more information: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
